name: [LD51] Last 5 Minutes
description:
Versions v0.1.1
  • Reduced the volume of the BGM.
  • Fixed the bug that player's still sleep after kicked off the bed.
v.0.1  The initial LD Compo submission
  • Fix during the publishing hour:
    • The bug of not playing hyper-fast BGM during the final 10-second countdown
    • Adding creator's name to the start screen.
